title: WCAS SPANISH 203-0-22 Individual and Society through Written Expression

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: First course of sequence designed to develop writing skills and structures through examination of the relationship between the individual and society. Emphasis on short texts and essays.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisites: 201, AP score of 5 on the Spanish Language or Literature Exam, or departmental Spanish Language Placement Exam

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: For more information on the course contact the coordinator Elisa Baena e-baena@northwestern.edu

subject: SPANISH
